items.text: Dr. Xiangguo SUN will serve as SPC for IJCAI 2026 and SIGIR 2026.
Dr. Xiangguo SUN is set to join Southeast University in Jan 2026 as a Full Professor.

old.text: CIT @ ROMA Lab (ROMA Lab Cultural Insight Test) version 4.3 released.
Dr. Xiangguo SUN was awarded NeurIPS'2025 Top Reviewer.
Dr. Xiangguo Sun has been appointed to a dual leadership role at CAAI: Deputy Secretary-General for Social Computing and Social Intelligence, and Chair of the new Rising Scholars Committee.
